posts.title: Summary, April 27th, 2020
posts.text: Hi, everyone, welcome to my blog. This is my first blog. I want to share some helpful online resources I have used recently. Recommended ResourcesOnline Coding freeCodeCamp - You can quickly get the courses you want to learn for front-end. Online Reading liveBook I recommend Grokking AlgorithmsI read the Chinese version of it two years ago, and I plan to reread the original version. Also, you can get other programming books from liveBook. Online Courses I follow Programming with Mosh on YouTube, who was a senior software developer before, recently quit his job and become a full-time teacher. I learned React.js, node.js from him. Also, he has his website, which has many useful courses for programming.
